content:
During the last day, 70 combat clashes took place on the front. In total, the enemy has struck 4 rocket launchers and 69 aviation strikes in the last day, and 123 shelling from rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

This is stated inmessageThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In Volyn and Polissya directionsThe operational situation remains without significant changes.

In the Siversky and Slobozhansky directionsThe enemy retains military presence in border areas, conducts sabotage activities in order to prevent the transfer of our troops to threatening directions, increases the density of mine-explosive barriers along the state border in Belgorod region.

In Kupyansk directionThe enemy of the offensive (assault) did not take action.

In the estuary directionOur warriors repelled 17 attacks of the enemy in the areas of settlements of Bigorivka, Zolotarivka of Lugansk region and Yampolivka, Territory, Rozdolivka, Vesele Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defense of our troops.

In the Bakhmut directionOur defenders repelled 5 enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Bogdanivka, Ivanivske, Klyshchiyivka of Donetsk region.

In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders repelled 14 enemy attacks in the areas of settlements Berdychi, Semenivka, Tonenko, Pervomaisk, Netaylovo, Nevelskoye Donetsk region.

In the Novopavlovsky directionThe forces of defense continue to restrain the enemy in the districts of Krasnogorivka, St. George, Novomikhailivka, Vodyane, Harvest, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried 24 times to break through the defense of our troops.

In the Orikhiv directionThe enemy 7 times, with the support of aviation, attacked the positions of our defenders in the areas of settlements of Staromayorsk Donetsk region and a robot of Zaporizhzhya region.

In the Kherson directionThe enemy does not give up the intention to knock out our units from the bridgeheads on the Dnieper Left Bank. So, during the last day, 3 attacks were made on the positions of our troops on the left bank of the Dnieper.

At the same time, our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and technology, depleting the enemy along the entire front line.
title: The enemy intensified in the estuary direction and attacks on Novopavlovsky - the General Staff of the Armed Forces
